resources.string:
Setup:
 This application requires notification access in order to be able to read the contents of notifications. 

 Title of notification:
 The title can be changed with the following syntax:
 $name - translates into the name of the application that sent the original notification
 $title - translates into the original title of the notification
 $test - translates into the original text of the notification
 All other characters will be treated as text and displayed without any modifications in the title. 

 Color of notification:
 The color of the notification cannot by this application. This needs to be done in setting on the phone. Settings for this are located at "Edge lightning">"Edge Light Style">"Color" >"Custom Color". To change the color of an application there needs to be an exact match between the title of the notification and an setting in the list "By Text".
